Created attachment 25462
a test of base64 encode/decode

The base64 implementation in org.apache.tomcat.lite.util.Base64 (trunk, rev. 946138) is broken. Try the attached test.

IMHO it should be thrown away. Its implementation has all kinds of buffer size problems that are beyond fixing. (The one in org.apache.catalina.util.Base64 works, but it has an interface that is hard to use, I'll file a separate issue).
